title: Otonari wa 1-ken de 2-do Oishii
original_name: お隣は 1 軒で 2 度おいしい
sinopse: Azusa Akimoto is in love with the student body president Ousuke Kobayashi, but she would never dream of confessing to him. Then one day she discovers that he has moved into the house next door to live with his uncle, a novelist. When she is offered a part-time position helping them with housework she takes the opportunity to get closer. However, not everything will be easy when living next to two handsome young men!
